!Tablet of Vision: A familiar feeling rushes through your body. And then when it seems unbearable, a new vision appears...%% All the pleasure, pain, anger and love ever felt by all the previous challengers of this power courses at once through your veins!%% The emotions rush over you like a waterfall, and the screams you hear are your own as you slip into unconsciousness...%% %% ...%% ...%% And then you awake... You mouth moves, but no words are formed...%% Could this be the end?
